pos: nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

idioms.reading: のこりものにはふくがある
idioms.meaning: there is unexpected good in what others have left behind

idioms.reading: のこりものにふくあり
idioms.meaning: there is unexpected good in what others have left behind

idioms.reading: のこりものにふくがある
idioms.meaning: there is unexpected good in what others have left behind

lessons.japanese: 強者は生き残り、弱者は死ぬものだ。
lessons.indonesian: The strong will survive and the weak will die.

lessons.japanese: それはお昼の残り物だよ。
lessons.indonesian: Those are the leftovers from lunch.
